headline: Sometimes It's Hard to Be a Jew
authors: Linda S. Haase, ContributorSenior Associate Vice President of Marketing Communications
short_description: That metal taste in my mouth is back, a nauseating combination of rage, shame and fear. It's been years since I have tasted it -- perhaps not since the last time someone drew a swastika on the whiteboard hanging on my dorm room door.
